title: Render of Scrumptious Flesh
content:
Render of Scrumptious Flesh Rare 4~16 Damage Versatile - Wielding With Both Hands 1d10 (1d8)+2 Slashing+1d4Necrotic Weapon Enchantment +2 Proficiency with this weapon type unlocks: It might be your imagination, but when blood runs over the blade, you could swear you hear... slurping.
